General.Name: Hunan Sokan New Materials Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Hunan Sokan New Materials Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells coatings, inks, and adhesives for consumer electronics and passenger cars in China. The company provides second generation PVD, UV and imitating anodizing coating, 3D spray ink, and Hf resistant protective ink, as well as wireless charger for mobiles, laptops, smart wear, smart homes, and cars. It also offers automotive lamp anti-fog coatings and passenger car parts PVD coating technology. Hunan Sokan New Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Ningxiang, China.
General.Address: No. 777, North Third Ring Road, Ningxiang, China

2.Name: Mr. Miao  Peikai
